ComicInfo.Title: The Mystery of the Mechanical Corpse, Part Five
ComicInfo.Summary:
Lady Mechanika has discovered the birthplace of Seraphina's involuntary metamorphosis: a gruesome secret laboratory aboard Blackpool's airship. Will she also find the answers to her own origins amid his menagerie of mechanically enhanced creatures? Join us for the captivating conclusion to the Mystery of the Mechanical Corpse in this giant-sized finale!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Regular Edition | Joe Benitez & Peter Steigerwald | 1 | B | Variant Retail Edition | Franchesco! & Peter Steigerwald | 4 | C | Retailer Incentive Limited Edition | Joe Benitez & Peter Steigerwald | 5 | D | Euro Edition (Limited to 500 copies) | Joe Benitez & Leonardo Olea | 3 | E | Grey Edition | Joe Benitez | 2 | F | Steigerwald Exclusive Limited Edition (Limited to 500 copies) | Peter Steigerwald | Missing | Blank | Blank Sketch Cover (Limited to 200 numbered copies) | None | Missing | Note: Covers are lettered (A-Z) according to JoeBenitez.com.
